channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Rip-Off Britain
channel.desc: Louise Minchin, Gloria Hunniford and Julia Somerville investigate the mystery cracks in laptop screens that left a trail of angry customers. Who is responsible? Also on the programme, the man who had to correct the maths homework of one of the biggest names in energy. The team investigate whether its new systems are to blame for the butchered bills. And the advice clinic is open with the best tips on how to keep more of your money safe in your pocket.
